titles.title: Hymn 123 - Behold Us As We Thy People

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Behold us as we Thy people
Are kneeling at Thy feet
O God on Thy mercy alone
We are placing our faith

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We thank Thee for sparing our lives
We the ungrateful being
Let us hearken To thy warning
When Thy mercy still holds

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord, make use of Thy only grace
To change our sinful souls
That we may rely on Thy word
And seek Thy own face

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Heal the ailments in our body
We seek Thy blessing
This is only our earnest plea
Have mercy upon us
